name: The Collapsing Labyrinth
description:
A boy struggles with his nightmares, fighting demons and horrible monsters, trapped in a never ending labyrinth. Can he escape his nightmares in time? More importantly, are the nightmares actually happening, or are they all in his head?

*** Controls ***

WASD - Move

Space - Roll

Directional Keys - Attack

E - Open Inventory

CTRL + F - Fullscreen

Esc - Exit

** By JO & ET **
